section.title: Overview
section.p: The Account Details section of the allows you to update your profile information, change your password, or delete your account.

li.p: Add Profile Image: The camera icon on the profile image allows you to upload a new profile picture.
Edit Profile: The profile section includes a gear icon that allows you to edit the following profile details:

image.alt: Edit Profile dialog displayed after selecting the gear icon. The dialog includes fields for First Name, Middle Name, Last Name, Email, and Current Password. Users can update their profile details and confirm changes by clicking the 'Update' button or cancel by selecting 'Close'.
